Description:
Detects backup catalog deletions

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tom U. @c_APT_ure (collection)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Backup Catalog Deleted
Query: sourcetype='windows-application' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '524' and provider_name = 'microsoft-windows-backup'
